travels.title: Arizona '02
travels.headertext: We visited the Grand Canyon and Sedona in 2002. We flew to Phoenix, then drove north to Flagstaff and the Grand Canyon and came back via the Sedona area.

entry.text: We stopped at some adobe ruins on the way to the Grand Canyon.
On the rim of the Grand Canyon.
A coyote we met near the Grand Canyon.
We did a short hike down one of the trails below the rim, but we didn't go too far.
We also did some good hiking near the Sedona area.
